narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Kaiser Foundation Hospitals is a General Acute Care Hospital provider based in Downey, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $101.2M in Medicaid payments across 2.4M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $101.2M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 12,654 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
